Autoencoder model

Created on 2019. 6. 17.

@author: Inwoo Chung (gutomitai@gmail.com)

class gan.AbstractGAN(conf)¶

Abstract generative adversarial network.

compile()¶

Create the GAN model and compile it.

abstract fit(x_inputs, x_outputs)¶

Train the GAN model.

Parameters

  • x_inputs (list.) – Training data numpy array list.

  • x_outputs (list.) – Ground truth data numpy array list.

abstract fit_generator(generator, max_queue_size=10, workers=1, use_multiprocessing=False, shuffle=True)¶

Train the GAN model with the generator.

Parameters

  • generator (Generator) – Training data generator.

  • max_queue_size (Integer) – Maximum size for the generator queue (default: 10).

  • workers (Integer) – Maximum number of processes to get samples (default: 1, 0: main thread).

  • use_multiprocessing (Boolean) – Multi-processing flag (default: False).

  • shuffle (Boolean) – Batch shuffling flag (default: True).

abstract generate(*args, **kwargs)¶

Generate styled images.
